title: I'm a Karthus main since yesterday and he will be completely trashed by the new veil kinda item
body:
So I propose that his ult activate instantly and delivers two instances of damage.

The first instance should deal 1 true damage and disable all spellshields
The second instance is the current damage, but refunds 20% of the cooldown for each champion hit


This will separate good Karthus from great Karthus
